resources.string: We raise specialty “Midget White” turkeys each year for Thanksgiving. " + "Midget Whites love to spend their day foraging, so on our farm they enjoy a diet of free range shrub steppe findings supplemented with locally sourced, non-GMO, corn- and soy-free feed. " + "This sought after breed takes about 7 months to grow to a compact 8-18 pounds, but rewards the chef with rich and juicy flavor. " + "Watch our store for the opportunity to reserve your Thanksgiving bird!
